mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, name, nn, admin, reg_date, profile) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nn}, 0, now(), #{profile})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, name, nn, admin, reg_date, profile FROM user WHERE user_id=#{userId}

mapper.update: UPDATE user SET admin=1 WHERE user_id=#{userId}
